price: (93) Say, [O Muḥammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
